questions.question: Which rock is also called secondary rock?

answers.d: No class of rock is termed so

explanations.b: Explanation :Sedimentary rocks are also called secondary rocks. This group includes a wide variety of rocks formed by accumulation, compaction and consolidation of sediments.

questions.question: Which is the rock present in the majority on the surface of earth?

answers.d: No class of rock in particular

explanations.b: Explanation :Sedimentary rocks are known to cover as much as 75 percent of the surface of the earth the rest being covered by the igneous rocks and the metamorphic rocks.

questions.question: What are the mechanically formed sedimentary rocks also called?

explanations.a: Explanation :Sedimentary rocks are known to cover as much as 75 percent of the surface of the earth the rest being covered by the igneous rocks and the metamorphic rocks.

questions.question: Rock salt may be formed by

explanations.b: Explanation :Limestone may be formed by precipitation from carbonated water due to loss of carbon dioxide. Rock salt may be formed from sodium-chloride rich seawater merely by the process of continued evaporation.

questions.question: Example of chemically formed sedimentary rocks is

explanations.a: Explanation :Chemically formed rocks are of two types: precipitates and evaporites. Examples are limestones, rock salt, gypsum and anhydrite.

questions.question: Pick the organically formed sedimentary rock

explanations.d: Explanation :Limestones are the best examples of organically formed sedimentary rocks. Generally, the evidence of the source material gets obliterated from these rocks with the passage of time.
